metadata.name: Still
metadata.description:
Combs & Clips is a series of photographs created in a successful attempt to overcome a creative block. The collection aims to express the beauty in the mundane and how intriguing the mind of an artist can be. The process  of creation was an impulsive and experimental one, a process which ultimately led to a form of an artistic refresh for the artist as it pushed him outside his comfort zone and brought him to the realization of a new aspect of his creativity.

License: Primary NFT holder is free to use in advertising, display privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, documentaries and essays by holder of the NFT, as long as creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution, or derivative works. Copyright remains with creator.
